name: Project 3 2D Platformer Complete Submission
description:
These are my 3 modifications

1. Main menu title change, different background, centered main menu with different colors, filled in instructions and level select. 

2. There will be 3 levels the first level will be a platform get to the other side and reach the end with a pool of acid below. The second level will be a maze in search for the right key with enemies in the beginning. The third level will contain platforming upward and reaching the top using jumping and jumping on as a main focus.

3. The UI will be modified visually and the pause screen will state the goal of each level and be modified visually.

Credits:

Created by Vinh Tran
